reviews.review: fun game full of nerds and fat lesbos

The game is very survivor sided which makes me want to face camp every Claudette that clicks her flashlight at me and tunnel every Feng that camps pallets. If I camp and tunnel, I get called names and told I'm bad. If I completely abandon the role of being a killer and "have fun" with the survivors, THEN I will get a couple "ggs." 

That being said, I can't stop playing. Looping the killer is fun, when I manage to succeed, and I enjoy risking my own life at times to save others (even if they're randoms and wouldn't do the same for me). I do think that people forget that the role of the killer is to kill you and ruin your chances of making it out alive. If the killer is face camping you, consider that it's because he's having a bad game and wants to secure at least one kill. If the killer is tunneling you, ask yourself "did I t-bag at pallets, spam click my flashlight, or be annoying and obnoxious in some other way that led to me being tunneled because the killer is tired of survivors being assholes in a survivor sided game?" The answer is probably yes. 

At the end of the day, killers and survivors are both going to play in a way that makes the game most fun for them. You probably don't care if your BM as a survivor is annoying me when I play killer (you probably hope that it is, why else would you be obnoxious?). Just like I don't care if you're not having fun while I tunnel and face camp you. Survivors may have fun being annoying little rats and killers may have fun watching the life drain from a specific survivor's eyes even if they know that they're most likely only going to get that one kill. 

Play the game, it's really fun if you let it be. Just know that if your definition of having fun as a survivor is being as obnoxious as possible, then the killer is probably going to have just as much fun tunneling and camping you.

I used to like this game, obviously. I used to enjoy the unique gameplay of each character. But recently I've had the realization that every killer is the same few playstyles, and every single round you play is the same. You load in, the killer usually finds you immediately, and they are playing some killer that's hard to counter. They'll down you, hook you, then linger around until one of your teammates comes to get you. At this point two things may happen: you get down, hooked again, or your teammate leaves the game when they get downed for trying to unhook right in front of the killer. I'd elaborate but I really don't care to unless someone asks

Macht im Team richtig Spaß. Es braucht ein paar Runden bis man mal drin ist und verbesserte Talente erhält, aber damit steigt der Spielspaß zunehmend. Spielt man alleine, kann man als Killer ebenfalls gut leveln und die gesammelten Blutpunkte sowohl im Blutnetz des Killers als auch im Blutnetz der Survivor verteilen, um später mit seinen Freunden die besten Talente einsetzen zu können.
Das wichtigste ist nie planlos herum zu rennen oder rum zu stehen, sondern immer am Generator zu hängen und diesen reparieren, Teammates heilen, Haken sabotieren oder Totems zu zerstören, um letztendlich mit vielen Punkten zu entkommen.

主机玩家和韩国人，是不是都是低能玩意^^。我遇到的大多数韩国人和主机玩家，都是混狗，什么事都不做，不修机，不救人。就一直躲着，有一点点一点点心跳，就躲起来。也不动，要么就是躲在柜子里面。我真的遇到的大多数都是这样。真的很自私，真的不是来玩游戏的，都是来炫耀自己批发的妈的。炫耀自己的生mu和养mu，今天晚上就会si掉^^。游戏好玩，只不过很多玩游戏的人素质不行。蠢恶心人。有朋友就买来玩吧，没有就慎入吧。
